scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix dashboard && npm install --prefix mindfulness-backend && npm install --prefix mindfulness-client && npm install --prefix resource && npm install --prefix dashboard/backend && npm install --prefix "chat app FINAL/backend" && npm install --prefix "chat app FINAL/frontend"
scripts.dev:dashboard: cd dashboard && set PORT=5173 && npm run dev
scripts.dev:mindfulness-client: cd mindfulness-client && set PORT=3001 && set BROWSER=none && set REACT_APP_BROWSER=none && npm start
scripts.all: concurrently --names "BACKEND,DASHBOARD,MINDFULNESS,CHAT-BACKEND,CHAT-FRONTEND" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:mindfulness-client" "npm run dev:chat-backend" "npm run dev:chat-frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix dashboard && npm run build --prefix mindfulness-client && npm run build --prefix resource && npm run build --prefix "chat app FINAL/frontend"
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build
